about_the_game:
Welcome to The Night Museum, an underground complex filled with oddities and horrors. As the newest hire, your duties include the admission of customers and cleaning up after them. Each night brings new challenges: refilling the generator, keeping the freaks calm, and ensuring the exhibit stays operational, no matter how strange and chaotic things get.

Features

  • Retro-Inspired Horror: Experience the eerie charm of low-poly, low-resolution visuals with a nostalgic twist.

  • Five Nights of Terror: Survive five increasingly difficult nights, where every task grows more complicated.

  • Manage the Oddities: Interact with unsettling artefacts, human oddities, and a host of chilling exhibits.

  • Endless Mode: Unlock a never-ending challenge after completing the main game for those brave enough to keep the horrors alive.

  • First-Person Perspective: Fully immerse yourself in the dread as you navigate the claustrophobic museum halls.

Can you survive the night shift and uncover the mysteries lurking beneath the museum’s surface? Or will you join the collection of oddities forever?

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of gore and dismembered body parts including severed heads.

short_description: Step into the night shift at a mysterious underground museum of human oddities and strange artefacts. In this retro-inspired horror game, manage the exhibit, survive five chilling nights, and unlock endless terror in an unrelenting mode. Can you keep the freaks calm and make it through the night?
